product_name: Case Cutlery Yellow Synthetic Medium Stockman Knife
long_description: Durable, visible and tough for year-round use, the Case Cutlery Yellow Synthetic Medium Stockman Knife has a chrome vanadium clip blade, spey blade and sheepsfoot blade for camping and everyday use.
short_description: Durable, visible and tough for year-round use, the Case Cutlery Yellow Synthetic Medium Stockman Knife has a chrome vanadium clip blade, spey blade and sheepsfoot blade for camping and everyday use.
